price: (Isaan) ni jedhan: “Namni gabbaramtoota keenyatti kana hojjate dhugumatti, inni miidhaa raawwattoota irraayi.”
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
